title: Patricia's moving picture
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Margaret Pettigrew, Ann Pearson, Kathleen Shannon and Bonnie Sherr Klein
brief_description: Deals with the problems and frustration’s many women feel when they find that being a wife and mother at home does not fully occupy their time, and who do not find the stimulation they need to fulfil their lives and feel useful. Patricia wants to be “an individual” to be independent rather than the wife of Mr. Garner. (Awards: Melbourne, New York)
